headline: Questcorp Mining Strengthens Advisory Board with New Appointment
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - January 26, 2026) - Questcorp Mining Inc. (CSE: QQQ) (OTCQB: QQCMF) (FSE: D910) (the "Company" or "Questcorp") is pleased to announce that is has strengthened the Advisory Board with the appointment of Mr. Amandip Singh as an Advisor to the Board.Mr. Singh brings over 15 years of experience spanning mineral exploration, capital markets, and strategic transactions. He played a key role in Newmont's US$311 million acquisition of GT Gold and more...

content.title: Questcorp Mining Strengthens Advisory Board with New Appointment
content.summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - January 26, 2026) - Questcorp Mining Inc. (CSE: QQQ) (OTCQB: QQCMF) (FSE: D910) (the "Company" or "Questcorp") is pleased to announce that is has strengthened the Advisory Board with the appointment of Mr. Amandip Singh as an Advisor to the Board.Mr. Singh brings over 15 years of experience spanning mineral exploration, capital markets, and strategic transactions. He played a key role in Newmont's US$311 million acquisition of GT Gold and more...
